security.mode1: Mode 1: Keep password access for all users
security.mode1.desc: Not recommended. All users can connect by password. Risk of brute force attacks. Use only for testing.
security.mode2: Mode 2: Root only with SSH key, others can use password
security.mode2.desc: Transition mode. Root/sudo account SSH key only. Other users keep password access.

security.mode3.desc: Recommended for production. All SSH connections require a key. No risk of compromised passwords.
